website_summaries.verdict: A swing-only set that still offers something unique, thanks to its netted disc swing. Low-maintenance and easy to install.
pros: Made from durable powder coated steel
Swing chains are fully coated to prevent pinches to little fingers
Designed to be free-standing, so you can easily move and not deal with concrete
cons: Rests on the ground rather than being affixed into it

customer_reviews.title: If you are considering Lifetime playgyms, try this instead
customer_reviews.text: This is made very well, MUCH less expensive than the Chinese-made Lifetime products and unlike the Lifetime products that come with missing parts, defective parts, inferior assembly instructions and zero customer support post sale (I waited 4 weeks to get a response of missing parts and defective parts on 2 different orders) - THIS was a a completely different experience. All the parts - all in good order/condition - well written instructions and parts manufactured to fit PROPERLY -- you simply couldn't ask for better. At the price point of 75% of what Lifetime sells for their Chinese made junk you are MUCH better off buying Brutus brand items.
customer_reviews.author: Lee

customer_reviews.title: Quality Swingset
customer_reviews.text: Very high quality swingset. Arrived perfectly packed in 2 boxes weighing approximately 65lbs each. It looks like it will last a very long time. Kids will not outgrow it. Assembly was easy and took 2 people about 3 hours just taking their time. The most challenging part was getting the set anchored. I'm very satisfied and will likely buy other play equipment made by this brand.
customer_reviews.author: G.R.I.T.S

customer_reviews.title: Tricky assembly, but looks great!
customer_reviews.text: It was so hard for me to assemble it by myself. I didn’t pay attention to one of the screws that was slightly longer and that was why I couldn’t get the bolt to latch on. Next day I figured it out and now that it’s all done. The kids love it! Comes with most of the tools you need to assemble and the kids can enjoy it for many years.
customer_reviews.author: SuzieQ

customer_reviews.title: Perfect up to age 6
customer_reviews.text: Grandchildren here for 5 weeks had a swing set perfect for age s 5 and 3. It’s easy to take swings off and repurpose for hummingbirds. Only problem is if Covid keeps them away until next year, they will likely want something more challeging. Too bad the swing set doesn’t grow with them
customer_reviews.author: Dishpanhands

customer_reviews.title: Very good
customer_reviews.text: My older son was assembling it. I had to help here and there, he was just directing me what to do. Excellent packaging and instructions. Sturdy and is passing heavy load tests (me). Attaching to the anchors was rather tricky but manageable. I believe they need to think about some better solution. We'll see how it survives. So far my kids 11and 6 very happy. Anchors is a must imho for kids older than 6 but still very sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Mykhailo Z.

customer_reviews.title: Super sturdy
customer_reviews.text: This swing set is everything I hoped for it to be. Super sturdy. My 13 year old build it most on his own. Probably took around 2 hours. There was a very small dent in the top bar so we couldn’t get one of the legs in but we tapped it out and all’s good
customer_reviews.author: bg

customer_reviews.title: Great swing set
customer_reviews.text: Well built and designed product. Very sturdy. My 3 year old loves it. The material doesn’t seem like it will rust, but time will tell with Ohio weather. It comes with hooks to secure it to the ground. However, we didn’t attach them. My 3 year old weighs 28lbs and the set doesn’t move as she is pushed high. Makes it easier to move to mow the lawn. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah D

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome! It took about 3 hours to assemble. Not many tools required. Very sturdy metal! It looks like it will last a long time! If you are looking for a non wooden swing set then the Brutus line is your choice!
customer_reviews.author: Chris Bender

customer_reviews.title: Great swingset
customer_reviews.text: I put this together in an hour by myself. I wouldn’t call it easy to put together but wasn’t as difficult as I thought it would be. It’s super sturdy and great for little kids. Also looks higher quality than wooden structures! My son loves the black basket seat, it’s all great quality.
customer_reviews.author: Adam Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Great little swing set
customer_reviews.text: This is a sturdy swing set. We have a 7 and 5 year old who will use it regularly. We are glad that we went with this bigger size that includes the web swing. The kids LOVE this swing set.
customer_reviews.author: MuhShell27

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome quality, easy and quick assembly! Also pretty easy to move around the yard with two people if you can't decide on placement like us :-). We've had a ton of kids/ adults on this swing set and it's held up great. I've also ordered different types of swings to switch out and that was very easy to do as well. Very fun for the kids!
customer_reviews.author: Olga G

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality; easy assembly
customer_reviews.text: Good quality. Easy to assemble. Took 2 adults just under 3 hours to build.
customer_reviews.author: Ang-a-bee

customer_reviews.title: not bad
customer_reviews.text: make sure to look at the packaging we had the two parts for the main support beam were bent bad had to order new parts which took about a week to a week and a half for the part to come then those were kinda bent i was not going to wait for them to take another week to get the parts .
customer_reviews.author: Erin Kobylarczyk

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy set
customer_reviews.text: Seems to be well made and my granddaughter loves it. Eas6 to assemble but can’t attest to the durability yet. Would definitely recommend so far.
customer_reviews.author: Susan C.

customer_reviews.title: Great but with some issues
customer_reviews.text: A couple of bolts and nuts were missing Also, if you want to use the anchors you have to make holes yourself on the black Plastic footers. Also the rope seat was torn within the first few days of use by my 2year old. Other than that it’s a great product.
customer_reviews.author: SLG O.

customer_reviews.title: It's pretty awesome
customer_reviews.text: It took my boyfriend and I 1 hour to assemble and that's mostly because it was hot lol it appears to be very sturdy, it held my boyfriend, daughter and myself at the same time. Good quality and very happy with it! Would recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Kristen Gordon

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding Quality
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this swing set for my grandchildren. They love it! I was very impressed with the quality of the swing set. Very sturdy and well built. It exceeded my expectations.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph J Menard

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: We love this product. Took 3 people less than an hour to assemble. Super sturdy, and my 8 year old absolutely loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Guerra

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Hardest part was leveling our yard. Instructions were clear, very easy to assemble with 2 people. Feels very sturdy
customer_reviews.author: Lilly P

customer_reviews.title: GREAT
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my great grandsons 3rd birthday . Declan and his little sister River insist on swinging every day......rain or shine!
customer_reviews.author: JJ

product_meta.title: Backyard Discovery Little Brutus Heavy Duty Metal A-Frame Swing Set
product_meta.description: Enjoy hours of fun with 3 swing options on our new Little Brutus outdoor metal swing set.With Backyard Discovery, you get so much more than a standard a-frame metal swing set. Our robust swing set frame is made of thick, powder coated steel creating a high quality, durable feature that will outlast the competition and create less stress on you by eliminating the need for staining or painting required on wooden playsets. 3wide-lane swing positions are equipped with 2 heavy-duty 26-inch belt swings and a web disc swing. Fully coated chains offer the pinch-free, snag-free qualities that parents appreciate. This low maintenance, weather resistant swing set is easy to build and will be ready to enjoy in no time. At Backyard Discovery we are dedicated to creating a lifetime of memories with our outdoor play products.With the new Little Brutus, we’ve created a way to get even the youngest kids included in the advantages that outdoor activities bring.
feature_bullets: Heavy-Duty:Heavy-duty powder coated steel and A-frame construction creates substantial structure and stability to support long-lasting value inoutdoor fun.
Quality:Low maintenance, weather resistant quality prevents cracking, warping and rotting. Giving your kids a lifetime of fun.
Multi-Swing Options:wide-lane swing positions come equipped with 2 heavy-duty belt swings and web disc swing.
Coated steel chains:Fully coated steel chains prevent snags, pinches and rust. Ensuring parents can feel as ease while their kids are playing
Free Standing:With molded feet and anchors included you won’t have to worry about additional purchases or mixing cement
Worry Free:Backyard Discovery provides a full 1-year warranty, reach out to us directly if you have any questions or concerns

Safe Play:Engineered to meet or exceed ASTM standards (FM1148-19). This product is intended for RESIDENTIAL USE ONLY. Any use of this product outside of a residential setting will make the product warranty null and void.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.9 out of 5 stars47 ratings4.9 out of 5 stars
